summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Birthday Organizer Bot - both backend APIs and frontend functionality are working perfectly
passed_tests: Backend API /api/health endpoint returns bot_active: true
Backend API /api/stats endpoint returns user/team/event counts
Backend API /api/telegram/webhook POST endpoint accepts updates
Frontend loads and displays bot status page with stats
Frontend 'Open Bot on Telegram' button links to correct bot URL
All status cards display properly (Health, Users, Teams, Events)
Visual design and layout are correct
Telegram link security attributes are proper
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (13/13 tests passed), Frontend: 100% (all UI elements and integrations working)
